name: Myths of the World: Of Fiends and Fairies - A Magical Hidden Object Adventure (Full)
name_original: Myths of the World: Of Fiends and Fairies - A Magical Hidden Object Adventure (Full)
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

Race against time to rescue the captured fairies! Stop a vengeful witch from using their essence to open the doorway to the fairy realm and releasing the army of a wrathful king upon the people who wronged her.

• SAVE ALL THE CREATURES OF MYTH
Explore a captivating world full of mystical creatures and charming fairies while searching for hidden objects and solving interactive mini games and puzzles!

• DISCOVER THE TRUTH ABOUT YOUR GRANDFATHER
Your grandfather has passed away and left behind some incredible secrets. A fairy searching for your grandfather has found you instead and pleads for your help!

• STOP THE EVIL WITCH FROM EXACTING HER REVENGE
With the help of your newly found fairy friend, uncover the insidious intentions of an evil witch and the mysterious fairy kidnapper!

• HELP MAGRAT RESCUE HIS CHILDREN IN THE BONUS CHAPTER!
Unlock challenging achievements and scour locations for hidden collectibles. Enjoy other extras such as beautifully rendered concept art and wallpapers!
